headline: EdTech Breakthrough Awards Frontline HCM With 2025 “Education Administration Solution of the Year”
summary: Prestigious International Awards Program Recognizes Outstanding Educational Technology Products and CompaniesLOS ANGELES, June 10, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- June 4, 2025 – EdTech Breakthrough, a leading market intelligence organization that recognizes the top companies and solutions in the global educational technology market, today announced that Frontline Education, a leading provider of administration software purpose-built for educators in K-12, has been selected as winner of the “Education A
